name: GAMER ANNIHILATION SQUAD
description:
"Last year, Congress passed the Enhanced National Security Act of 2049 and established the:

GAMER. ANNIHILATION. SQUAD.

And now, after weeks of gruelling training at the Academy, the G.A.S. is seeing its first batch of cadets walk through the door.

What will fate make of these fresh-faced initiates?"

-----

A spoof visual novel made originally for NaNoWriMo 2021 and expanded on in 2022.

!CONTENT WARNING!

This story includes violence, bad words and a few still shots of sexual organs and gaping assholes. Children should not play it.
